shortdesc.ph: Sets the low and high frequency parameters of the headphone equalizer.
Sets the low and high frequency parameters of the headphone equalizer.

p.codeblock: virtual int setHeadphoneEQParameters(int lowGain, int highGain) = 0;
public abstract int setHeadphoneEQParameters(int lowGain, int highGain);

section.p: In spatial audio scenarios, if calling does not achieve the desired headphone equalizer effect, you can further adjust it by calling this method.
If calling does not achieve the desired effect, you can call to further adjust the low and high frequency parameters of the headphone equalizer.

plentry.pd: Low frequency parameter of the headphone equalizer. The range is [-10, 10]. The larger the value, the fuller the sound.
High frequency parameter of the headphone equalizer. The range is [-10, 10]. The larger the value, the clearer the sound.
Low frequency parameter of the headphone equalizer, range is [-10, 10]. The higher the value, the deeper the sound.
High frequency parameter of the headphone equalizer, range is [-10, 10]. The higher the value, the clearer the sound.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-1: A general error occurred (no specific reason).
